Summon Units:#2509 Shard Wight x 20+ [4/lvl]
A Tomb Oracle or a powerful Ktonian Necromancer releases vast powers and opens a tomb hall to let unquiet spirits animate the entire tomb. A great number of Shard Wights are created.
